content: these ribbed socks are knit from the cuff and ankle top down with a heel-flap construction the 3x1 ribbing using cc1 co 64 sts join in the round being careful extends around the entire ankle and not to twist across the instep the toe is grafted *k1 p1 repeat from * for 6 rounds together this pattern will fit most adult foot sizes as the foot section using cc2 k1 p1 for 5 rounds can be knit to desired length using cc1 and k1 p1 for another 6 rounds additional sizing adjustment can be made by going up or down a needle size using mc *k3 p1 repeat from * around continue until sock measures 7 from cast on edge yarn sandnesgarn sisu 80% superwash wool 20% nylon 191yds per 50g shown in heel flap 1053 grey heather mc 2 balls 1012 natural cc1 1 ball and this section is worked flat back and forth across the 4228 red cc2 1 ball first 32 sts the other 32sts are held on spare needles or 100g of yarn is needed to knit the pair of socks the magic loop cord needles 2 25mm/us1 - 2 75mm/us2 double pointed using cc1 needles or longer circular for magic loop the smaller row 1 rs *sl1 k1 repeat from * to marker needles are recommended for youth or adult small socks the larger needles for adult medium to large row 2 ws sl1 p to end of row start of heel flap sts length of sock is adjusted during knitting repeat row 1 and 2 fifteen more times for a total of gauge 28-30 st = 4 /10cm in stockinette 16 repeats repeat row 1 one more time other tools darning needle © 2019 galt house of yarn all rights reserved v1 1 www galthouseofyarn ca turning heel foot and toe setup a ws sl1 p17 p2tog p1 turn continue as established working ribbed pattern on top of the foot and plain stockinette k every stitch on the setup b rs sl1 k5 ssk k1 turn bottom until the sock measures 2 /5cm shorter than row 1 ws sl1 p to 1 st before gap made by previous the total desired length turn p2tog p1 turn using cc1 set-up round k16 k15 k2tog k to end of row 2 rs sl1 k to 1 st before gap made by previous round 32sts between lsp and rsp on both sides turn ssk k1 turn decreasing round a k to 3 sts before lsp k2tog k1 repeat row 1 and 2 until all heel flap sts are included in k1 ssk k to 3 sts before rsp k2tog k1 k1 ssk k to the turn 18st remaining from heel flap end of round 4 sts decreased gusset decreasing round b k repeat decreasing rounds a and b using mc pick up and knit 16 sts along abbreviations seven more times 32 sts remain the left side of the heel flap pm or note k knit this
